name: 3dLocalUnifize
author: AFNI Team
description: This program generates a 'unifized' output volume by estimating the median in the local neighborhood of each voxel and using that to scale each voxel's brightness.

inputs.description: Name of temporary working directory (def: __wdir_LocalUni_, plus a random alphanumeric str)
inputs.name: Working directory name

inputs.description: Run this program very verbosely (default: false)
inputs.name: Verbose mode

inputs.description: Do not remove the working directory (default: remove it)
inputs.name: Do not remove working directory

inputs.description: The spherical neighborhood's radius for the 3dLocalStat step (default: -3)
inputs.name: Local radius

inputs.description: The percentile used in the 3dLocalStat step, generating the scaling volume (default: 50)
inputs.name: Local percentile

inputs.description: Provide the masking option for the 3dLocalStat step; to remove any masking, put 'None' as the option value (default: "-automask")
inputs.name: Local mask

inputs.description: Ceiling on values in the final, scaled dataset; values <=0 turn off this final filtering (default: 1.5)
inputs.name: Filter threshold
